name: Impossible Block!
description:
Welcome to Impossible Block, this game is extremely addictive and frustrating!

How to play:
- Tap the screen to send the block flying in the air.
- Once the Square is aligned with the gap, tap the screen again while the block is in the air to freeze it in place and the wall will shoot across the screen. If you aren't aligned with the gap, you lose!

Warning: This game will probably make you very frustrated! You've been warned.
